revision.text: ==English== ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|Yadons}} # {{surname|en}}. ===Statistics=== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Yadon'' is the 26492<sup>nd</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 921 individuals. ''Yadon'' is most common among White (94.03%) individuals. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=adnoy|ayond}}
